data.title: Technology Discounts
data.meta_description: These are some discounts that are available to faculty, staff and students of Doane University.
data.text:
These are some discounts that are available to faculty, staff and students of Doane University.

Direct Manufacturer Discounts

Apple Educational Discount

Dell Computer Discount

Microsoft Hardware and Software

Lenovo Computer Discount

Computer Software and Electronics Discounts

Microsoft Home Use Program for Employees:

This program enables you to get a 30% discount on an Office 365 Subscription

Under the Home Use Program (HUP), you and our other employees who are users of qualifying applications at work (e.g. Office Enterprise) may use the corresponding Home Use Program software to install and use on a home computer. You may continue using HUP software while you are under our employment and as long as the corresponding software you use at work has active Software Assurance coverage.

Access the Microsoft Home Use Program website:

Important: This program code is assigned to our college for the sole use of our employees in accessing this site. You may not share this number with anyone outside our organization.

Go to http://hup.microsoft.com/.

Enter your work email address.

Click on the link sent to the email address. Complete the steps on the website to access and purchase your subscription.

CDW Discounts

Mobile Phone and Accessories Discounts
